website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative to high-end headphones, they are perfect for traveling as they fold up and fit into the included carrying case.
pros: These headphones offer the utmost in comfort, as the ear cups can be turned to fit perfectly, and the sound quality is better than average with balanced bass
cons: The battery can drain quickly, even when not in use, and while the noice-cancelling is good, it doesn't block all outside noise

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good and works well for me
customer_reviews.text: Lowers outside noise but doesn't completely cancel it out, but I would need to spend 3 times this much to get a cancelling pair. Sounds good and works well for me. I can put them on while mowing and not have a cord coming from my pocket. Bluetooth has a good distance allowance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: one side stopped working after only 1 year of light use. Kept inside, never dropped or abused. Unacceptable. ----------- Decent pair of headphones, especially for the price. I bought these for my wife 8 months ago because she always got distracted from her grad school studying while I was chatting over the headset with my friends while playing video games in the next room. These help her stay focused by cancelling out my blabbering. Not a life changing set of headphones, but good enough, and at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: So I got these because I wanted some nice noise cancellign headphones
customer_reviews.text: So I got these because I wanted some nice noise cancellign headphones. but I did not want to spend 300$ There were only like 70 or 80 reviews when I bought them so I was apprehemsive. They are pretty great! they do noise cancel fairly well 8/10 compared to my boyfriends bose silent 35's they are comfortable 8/10 again compared to my the bose. I think its because of the material used for the headphones. but honestly for the price you can't beat it. bass is 8/10 could hit harder.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn L. Malone

customer_reviews.title: new company worth it.
customer_reviews.text: needed some new headphones, was tired of having cables and tight fits, was looking at some other ones but with the good reviews i had to go with these, you get so much for your money, even though i have never heard of jiffy before besides the plany company, but for $60 i toke a chance and it was worth!, the big 40mm drivers and noise canceling are a big plus, bluetooth 4.0 and like 200ft rang is amazing, even though they look like a bose rip offs there just as good and cheaper!.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for tuning out noisy neighbors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones to help me tune out our very noisy and often rude neighbors. They work REALLY well!! As soon as i hear our neighbors start to be loud or rude, i put these headphones on and all i hear is what i'm watching on my computer or music i'm listening to. say goodbye to noisy neighbor racket with these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: not noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality isn't bad and very comfortable but these are NOT noise cancelling. The noise cancelling works well on airplanes but if you're using them somewhere like a coffee shop, the noise cancelling feature seems to amplify ambient noise around you. I have to wear ear plugs with them if I want to not hear people around me talking. Good to buy if you want relatively inexpensive and comfortable headphones that you can wear around the house but absolutely not worth the money if you are looking for high quality noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. ANR does not distort sound at all. Putting them on even without the ANR reduces a lot of background noise. Love the wirelessness (though I am glad it also came with wires in case the battery runs out on a long plane flight or something). The control buttons on the right ear are also very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he LOVES them!!! The headphone lasted around 6-7hrs for Bluetooth use and noise canceling on our 15hr flight. He wore them plugged in and with the noise canceling feature on the rest of he flight and said they were very comfortable. The price is right and they seem great after a month of use they're perfect. The only complaint is the answering phone call feature is a bit complicated and to carry the headphones with the case is bulky. But for cheaper over ear noise canceling headphones they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Buckhannon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Nice over the ear bluetooth wireless headphones, I enjoyed them. Eventually wore out after daily use over about 3 years. Satisfied with the purchase. The noise cancelling was ok, but although it does help with an open office, it doesn't completely cut out ambient noise
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones to do exactly what the product says...cancel out the noise. I like them, but I don't like having to charge the headphones and that they do not work when the charge is low. I thought all headphones work regardless....
customer_reviews.author: BostonMomofOne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Even Last A Year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in early March and now in October, it cuts in and out sugnificantly whenever I walk, bike ride, or rollerblade. Now, it won't even charge and dies within the first five minutes of usage, even after charging all night and morning. Extremely disapointed. This item wasn't cheap, so for it to not even last a year but half of one, sucks a lot. Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: Connects wirelessly to my TV, phone and computer. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Connects wirelessly to my TV, phone and computer. Comfortable. It could use more treble as I’m losing my hearing but I can hear well enough. I don’t have to keep the volume up and blast my wife either. Nice that we’re both happy 😃
customer_reviews.author: Dan Libby

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Although the active noise cancelling works well, I did not like the sound quality. It sounded a more acoustic and not crisp. I had Bludio headphones before and it sounded better than these. In addition, what made me decide to return it was because the right side of the headphone did not work when the ANC was turned off. When the ANC was on, that is when both sides of the headphones worked.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome head phone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome head phone!!! Very comfortable, compact, sounds great, and the noise cancelling works perfectly in planes. You can turn it on and off to notice how much background noise it really eliminates. It's insane, can't believe I didn't get a pair sooner. Watch 4 movies in a row on an international trip without a hitch. Haven't used Bluetooth or mic feature. Amazing, worth the very fair price compared to crazy expensive ones. Would recommended to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good option for 50$
customer_reviews.text: The sound is Good, Good bass but not the best The most beautiful thing i enjoyed is the Noise cancellation especially in the buses & plains.. on the other hand, the sound quality (mainly the bass) decreases ramatically when noise cancellation is ON The last thing that if the sound is 70% and more.. everyone in the room will be listing to your music 🎶 To conclude, For 50$ this is a good option to get
customer_reviews.author: Osama M Odat

customer_reviews.title: Everyone can hear what are you listening to
customer_reviews.text: The style of it is very nice very like new Bose headphones, the sound of it is not that load and if it was on Bluetooth the sound is even lower , so its not good for people who love very load sound, also the sound outside is hearable to much if you use it in office or library or quite place every one in the room can hear what you are listening to , for charging you need to charge it every day and half if you use it all day of work my rate for it is 6/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had these 7 months and they have held up ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these 7 months and they have held up. Noise canceling is very impressive on Airplanes and very loud Cafe's. They keep charge a very long time. Yes they are a bit tight, but thats why they keep the music flowing and the noise out.
customer_reviews.author: vascoaztec@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: Not noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: These do not cancel noise. They dull sound but I can hear conversations across the room at work while wearing these. Ok for listening to music but not to cancel noise.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Get these amaziong headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing noise cancelling headphones. I purchased them for an upcoming flight and don't want to hear all of the plane noise. Very comparable to the very expensive Bose headphones which cost significantly more $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Joe Coccia

customer_reviews.title: There was no noticeable change in the intensity of noise ...
customer_reviews.text: There was no noticeable change in the intensity of noise heard with the Active Noise Cancellation on versus it being off. Product was tested with multiple noise sources including a microwave, fan, voices, music, and television.
customer_reviews.author: Coach K

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, not Beats great, but a really good sound for the price. Lightweight and comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Bender

customer_reviews.title: Low-end headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations for these headphones. I read the reviews and thought they were going to be better than what they are. The bluethooth function is horrible, the quality sound drops dramatically. I have $25 Sony headphones with better sound quality (I'm sad to say). The good news? Well they are comfortable, and have a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR ACTIVE NOISE CANCELING ABILITY
customer_reviews.text: VERY POOR ACTIVE NOISE CANCELING ABILITY. INSTRUCTIONS CAM,E ON A 1"x1" PIECE PAPER AND WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO READ.WENT TO jIFFY WEBSITE AND THERE WAS NO SUPPORT FOR THE HEADPHONES.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Whisker

customer_reviews.title: Best you can have for this price
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best Noise Cancelling Headphones you can buy at the moment for under 100$. Pros: -Really comfortable -Lightweight and soft pads -Easy to use -Really nice case Cons: -Noise cancelling is okay but it doesn't cancel all the noises. Compared to the best selling chinese NC Headphones here in amazon this are better.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones, especially at this price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The noise quality is very crisp with well balanced bass. The noise cancelling works well, and I haven't run into any battery life issues even when using both noise cancelling and bluetooth at the same time for extended periods. I had one minor issue initially, and Jiffy's customer service was excellent and found a resolution very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine, but the quality is awful
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine, but the quality is awful. When I wear it I can tell something is broken inside since it jiggles around and it's annoying. Then 10 months later the fake leather just wore off and now leaves weird black paint in my ear. If I wanted something like that I may have as well bought dollar store headphones. Do not buy this if you hope for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fulgencio

customer_reviews.title: these were as good as those
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically for a 10 hour flight from SeaTac to schipol and they worked fantastically... I've had a pair of Bose noise cancelling over ear headphones that I forgot on a plane after departing a flight from Seattle to Qatar...these were as good as those...very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Product had everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: What I always wanted for an over-ear headphones were its comfortable and lightweight headbands, and the JIFFY product included both of those! The noise canceling mode also works very well; managed to negate most of the noise outside. I've used these since last Friday and it's doing pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Kanji Sano

customer_reviews.title: Great noise canceling for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life. Great active noise canceling. Works well with Windows and phones. Very cheap compared to other active noise canceling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Schneider

customer_reviews.title: These headphone are awesome especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are awesome especially for the price. Sound is great and Bluetooth phone works pretty good. Basically Bose knock offs fot 1/3 or 1/4 the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy and Emily Molin

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Good! The headphone is not too tight so doesn't squeez my head and I love the feature that the ear parts can be turned to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Feel very comfortable and the audio quality is great. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Henry R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for bigger heads
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ugly headphones, the headband is an awkward oval shape that makes the sides pop outward making them look ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Soulses

customer_reviews.title: Battery not Charging
customer_reviews.text: Battery gave up after one year of use. They were great headphones until now.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: good sound, long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Very goog product, I've bought a few. Confortable, good sound, long lasting battery, noise cancelling works well in plane.
customer_reviews.author: Eaha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound for music is great and the charge lasts for quite awhile. Far from noise cancellling, though.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Ofstedahl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have been perfect. I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Case

customer_reviews.title: Good Aeroplane Noise Cancelling.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these continually on a nine hour flight, noise cancelling was so good I did not want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Yobbo

customer_reviews.title: Snug fitting and good noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of different brands and Jiffy definitely came out on top. Headphones fit snugly and blocks out a great deal of sound. Their customer service is also top-notch. Responded to my questions very promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Cable from ear phones to short when flying, keeps snagging when turning g head.
customer_reviews.author: Portland girl uk

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t order these headphones. They don’t sound good and are difficult to connect to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how you get better for the money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how you get better for the money. I have nothing to compare them to but they feel high quality, the case is high quality and most importantly they sound great!
customer_reviews.author: rob pills

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, great price
customer_reviews.text: The price was very reasonable. They worked extremely well while traveling outside of the USA. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: David M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good noise blockers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for blocking airplane noise. Hard to figure out how to turn off!
customer_reviews.author: Lianne Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value !
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones.. work as advertised. NC feature works well.. Sound is great.. connection is great..
customer_reviews.author: kev

customer_reviews.title: great buy definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are amazing..29.99 can't beat it..great sound quality and comfort when you don't want to hear anything around you and just jam out !
customer_reviews.author: kythe

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE 'EM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling is excellent and the ear cushions are the softest/most comfortable that I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: roderick v. jones

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Sound quality is really good
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Sound quality is really good. Noise cancellation is not that impressive. External noises are softened but not entirely blocked out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, clear sound, easy to operate, great price - cannot ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Microphone does not work, everything else is good
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality, battery life, and noise cancellation are good for the price. But the microphone does not work! I tried on multiple devices, and it's a problem with this hardware, not the device. It had been a little over two months before I tried using the microphone (had bought this for flights), and the support warranty is only two months, so no option or info for contacting the seller (not even in the instruction manual). One might say that I should have tested every feature as soon as I received it--perhaps, but since everything else worked fine I did not test the mic until I actually needed it later.
customer_reviews.author: RReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit & comfort; hard to turn on and off
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and comfort of these headphones. I took a star away because I think it's a pain in the rear to turn on and off. I've run down the charge more than once because I cannot easily turn on or off. I really like that it comes with a carrying case, and that the headphones fold. Unlike other wireless headphones, you can use these when there is no charge as they come with a cord, so if it is not charged, you can plug the cord into the headphone and then into your device. .
customer_reviews.author: LuckyGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a fairly inexpensive set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a fairly inexpensive set of headphones, however, not the greatest noise cancellation. ***review update***headphones will not power on after approximately 6 months of having them. This is only about the 5th time I've used them. Highly unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Does not help block out office noise
customer_reviews.text: I work in a cubicle and conversations around me distract me from doing my job efficiently. I bought these head phones for the noise canceling feature and they don't really block out the surrounding noise. I like the Bluetooth capability but I did not really buy them to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage...spend the extra money for a better one
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after third use. I went cheap and paid the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rettich

customer_reviews.title: Have had for a half hour. Already discovered a ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a half hour. Already discovered a flaw in the active noise dampening. If I wear them while resting my head sideways on a pillow they generate a high pitched ring that increases in volume. Are firmware update to noise cancellation available?
customer_reviews.author: Eric Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Only one headphone worked.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality and only the left headphone worked. Had to return it and very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: The ANC is barely there. It will get some of the low frequencies but you will barely notice the difference in noise reducting with ANC on and off. I had a fan running in a different room and I could still hear it when I had the headphones on. The sound is decent for the price at least, but you don't get these to have them function as any other Bluetooth headset. For noise cancelling, go elsewhere. For Bluetooth headphones, go elsewhere. Skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling???
customer_reviews.text: I did not find the product cancelled the noise. Also it's a recharable unit and has no place for batteries so you must have use their charge cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This headphone doesn't cancel noise kind of regular They deceive people...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: JIFFY J200 Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Wireless Headphones with Microphone Over the Ear, Comfortable Lightweight Protein Earpads foldable, Phone Volume Control 30 Hours Playtime for 3.5mm device
feature_bullets: Consumer Alert: Most users do not need a license to operate this wireless microphone system. Nevertheless, operating this microphone system without a license is subject to certain restrictions: the system may not cause harmful interference; it must operate at a low power level (not in excess of 50 milliwatts); and it has no protection from interference received from any other device.

Purchasers should also be aware that the FCC is currently evaluating use of wireless microphone systems, and these rules are subject to change. For more information, call the FCC at 1-888- CALL-FCC (TTY: 1-888-TELL-FCC) or visit the FCC's wireless microphone website at fcc.gov/cgb/wirelessmicrophones.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars107 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
